an6.24:1.1: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu himavantam pabbatarajam padaleyya, ko pana vado chavaya avijjaya.
an6.24:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu samadhissa samapattikusalo hoti, samadhissa thitikusalo hoti, samadhissa vutthanakusalo hoti, samadhissa kallitakusalo hoti, samadhissa gocarakusalo hoti, samadhissa abhiniharakusalo hoti.
an6.24:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu himavantam pabbatarajam padaleyya, ko pana vado chavaya avijjaya”ti.
